node.@_TEXT: he did:key method, the operations it supports, and some security and privacy considerations that implementers might want to be aware of when implementing

node.@_TEXT: items regarding the document and key can be conflated
eg expiry, does the key expire or document exire
simplest possible implementation of a DID Method
